content: Is there a set of IPS examples, with xslt [or some other way] to render them ? I'd like to include this in some of our (Firely) FHIR training courses..
There are a few examples in the IPS guide, but that's failry minimalistic..
.. @John D'Amore collected some IPS examples from different sources ...

Yes. I was going to share yesterday the link to John's set of examples but got pulled away and didn't get back to that. Here is the link.
@René Spronk
Inclusive of a viewer .. thanks, well done.

Yes the viewer is hosted here: https://www.ipsviewer.com/
(apologies for late response, just getting back from a family holiday)
